title: Claimant employment dates
p1: It may help the tribunal if you can provide these details. You will not be penalised for not providing them.

et3ResponseEmploymentInformation.label: Do you want to provide any further information about the claimant's employment dates? (optional)

et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.dayNotANumber: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.monthNotANumber: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.yearNotANumber: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.dayRequired: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.monthRequired: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.yearRequired: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.dayInvalid: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.monthInvalid: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.yearInvalid: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.invalidDateTooFarInPast: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.invalidDate: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentStartDate.invalidDateInFuture: Enter a date in the past

et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.dayNotANumber: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.monthNotANumber: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.yearNotANumber: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.dayRequired: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.monthRequired: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.yearRequired: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.dayInvalid: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.monthInvalid: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.yearInvalid: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.invalidDateTooFarInPast: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.invalidDate: Enter a date in the correct format
et3ResponseEmploymentEndDate.invalidEndDateBeforeStartDate: This date must be later than the start date
